title.rendered: “IDF Demolishes Home of Terrorist Behind Ba’ale Gas Station Attack in Qalandiya”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces have demolished the home of the terrorist Mohammad Muna’sra in Qalandiya, who carried out the attack at the Ba’ale gas station and murdered Yitzhak Zeiger, of blessed memory, and Uriel Hartum, of blessed memory.

Last night, forces from the Benjamin Brigade conducted a battalion operation in Qalandiya, during which engineering units demolished the home of the terrorist Mohammad Muna’sra, who carried out the shooting attack at the Ba’ale gas station on February 29, 2024, in which Yitzhak Zeiger, of blessed memory, and Uriel Hartum, of blessed memory, were murdered.

During the operation, IDF and Border Police forces carried out arms searches and arrested suspects. The detained wanted individuals were transferred to security forces for further processing.

During the activity, several disturbances of order erupted. The forces responded with means to disperse demonstrations and fired towards key rioters. Hits were identified.

Attached is documentation from the demolition of the terrorist’s house: https://bit.ly/4dfWNW0

Attached are photos on the subject: https://idfanc.activetrail.biz/ANC2407202474365
